title: What are the most useless abilities in LoL.
body:
Like {{champion:1}} Annie's Molten Shield or {{champion:143}} 's passive.

EDIT: yes I know it can be used to build up her passive, but the ability itself is pretty lackluster imo.

EDIT: **WHAT ARE THE MOST UNSATISFYING ABILITIES IN LOL.**
it has come to my attention that no ability is 'useless.'

replies.body:
Unsatisfying, perhaps would have been a better word choice :P

Any ability that isn't an active ability. Nothing is more dissatisfying than playing a champ and going, "Well I just won't press e all game.". (or if you're like me, you will when you panic and absolutely nothing of use will come of it)
Agreed ! edited.

Alistar's heal? Zilean's passive? Sion's passive?

It's a bit hard to imagine actual useless abilities in this game but these 3 come to mind.
Ali heal? Lulwut?
his e is an AoE heal that gives piss all health. Like, it heals him for low 20s at lv 1 and even less for his surrounding allies. It's only good in URF for splitpushing the wave to no end.
I agree to disagree.

> Sion's passive?

This shit is op early game.
wt you on about?
LOL hard g{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Well you know, how easy it is to be kited, slowed, stunned, rooted, snared, displaced, and suppressed as Sion and so when your passive procs the majority of the time you are most likely gonna just give up because you're not gonna last long enough.  Any champion with movement affecting CC freely available will ultimately make Sion's passive useless which literally the vast majority of champions have. and to proc you have to die.

Are you kidding me? Annie's E is far from useless compared to other abilities. It is absolutely fantastic for a short range mage like Annie. You can E before starting a trade to block minion damage and some auto-attack damage. I occasionally max it to 3 points before other abilities especially for this reason. And yeah, it adds a stack of her passive so it makes it much easier to get to 4 stacks. Also, when you use it with Tibbers out, Tibbers gets the shield. This means that you can make Tibbers walk up to a melee or ADC, and get him to attack them. They either take the burn damage, or fight, and lose health because of the shield. I have killed people with Annie's E due to it's damage late game. It's like a built in thornmail.

Saying Annie's E is useless is like saying Ashe's E is useless. Sure it's not exactly impactful on the game itself, but it provides great vision and can save your butt, or even provide a set up for your ult. If you wanna talk useless abilities, Rengar's standard W is a pretty good example. It's damage is not high enough to be considered a damage ability, and why would you need an MR and armor buff on a stealthy assassin? Your not tanking these days, and the only thing it really does is add a stack of Ferocity, but you don't need that, because you only really use Ferocity stacks in and after you ult, or in the jungle. 

That been said some abilities may seem simple or even un-impactful but are specifically designed to set up or are good in the right situations, which doesn't implement play style to the champion, but instead adds some sauce on the top to them.

> [{quoted}](name=Rengorax,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ictNMlWG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-16T04:58:59.936+0000)It is absolutely fantastic for a short range mage like Annie.
Dude Annie has the longest aa range in the game. I have no clue where you got the impression that she's a 'short range' mage.
Bro this conversation was 15 days ago... no one cares anymore... the mage changes are already announced...

> Are you kidding me? Annie's E is far from useless compared to other abilities.
omg are you saying her e is more useful THAN ALL HER OTHER ABILITIES.


Before I start I apologise for using the term 'useless' which clearly isn't the correct word, but I'm still not convinced Annie's E is a great spell.

Firstly just because her e can block a bit of minion damage doesn't make it an great spell. Id rather have a spell that can save me from ganks like ahri's charm or katarina's e than something that can reduce minion damage. Most of the time you have already used your E anyway to get a stack of your passive, at least that's what I see in many Annie players.

I've already address the whole 'yea her e can add a stack of her passive' but so can literally any other spell if she was given one. It doesn't say much about the spell itself, its simply just helps the passive come into action.

I SERIOUSLY doubt you killed someone just with your e and tibbers bear damage. Sure you can make tibbers walk up to someone and attack them, but you can avoid him pretty easily by just walking away. Besides, you can buy bloodthirster or something and make the active useless anyway. There are only very uncommon situations where her E is extremely useful in the mid to late game, which is why I don't like it in the first place.

and finally

> Saying Annie's E is useless is like saying Ashe's E is useless. Sure it's not exactly impactful on the game itself, but it provides great vision and can save your butt, or even provide a set up for your ult.

How on earth is this a good analogy. You literally just said Ashe's E isn't impactful on the game itself yet you say it provides great vision, and can save your life and set up a good ultimate. Not to mention you can check important objectives from base. How is this comparable to a mini thornmail that lasts like 5 seconds.

Finally, as you know Riot is working on Annie in the mid year Mage update, and one of the things they want to see come out of the mage update is;
"Molten Shield should have value as a powerful defensive ability on a mage; especially one that’s often bear-dropping into the thick of battle."
Even the people who created annie don't think her E is as good as it could be right now, otherwise they would bother reworking the ability in the first place.
Sion's Shield. It does jack all unless you build AP. And that just screws with the common build path of AD Tank

Annie's molten shield is incredible for building a stun stack or making sure that enemies trading without are taking extra damage for everything they hit you with.

Zyra's passive is so good. There have been many times that I've finished the enemy off or given the enemy that last bit of damage from me to then have them low enough that my ally can kill them.

The worst spell in the game... Maybe Zileans new passive. I've found that whilst it isn't that bad, it really doesn't bring much to the game late game or really even mid-game.

{{champion:143}}
I know there are some good moments with Zyra's passive but I feel like its not as good as other passives because you have to be DEAD TO USE IT, There are few opportunities where this passive isn't completely useless and even when those opportunities arise, there is a massive delay of 2 seconds to fire SKILLSHOT making it easily jukeable.

God even {{champion:96}}'s passive does the same thing but he can follow his target so unless they have some kind of mobility spell or {{summoner:4}}, there really isn't any way they can escape the damage.

At least with her new passive, she can still be threatening when she IS ALIVE.

I've already talked about Annie's E below, and I agree with Zilean's passive honestly.

You're argument is very convincing. I agree that her passive isn't as good as kog's.
Although it always felt good when it worked. Maybe that's why I enjoyed it.

Yeh maybe the change will be helpful.

Apologies, I read your Annie comments after posting and was too lazy to alter my own.

I get what you mean, and I regret so much for titling the thread 'useless abilities' -.-

I won't deny getting a kill with Zyra's passive particularly against a toxic enemy who just killed you must be satisfying. as hell.
they are changing annie e to 40% damage reduction and zyra passive to w seeds in next patch anyway
nunu's w seems very unsatisfying to use
Cho'Gath's E
It farms like a bastard and procs rylai slow etc. Not useless.
{{champion:32}} passive is just UGH
{{champion:32}}  passive is pretty useful when you are chasing someone with your W and just by hitting aa's you increase your W and E's dmg. Although his passive certainly isn't a game changer.
Ezreal W

graves w isn't that useful.
mundos w is meh.
{{champion:19}} E
